name: Moonlight Mori
description:
*NEW* Endless mode added & now mobile accessible!

Mobile controls: Hold your finger on the screen and move it left & right to control Moondrop.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Help Moondrop collect orbs of light to restore light to the forest!

Avoid orbs of darkness or you'll lose!

Aim for the highest score and share it on Twitter!

Reach the end of the forest for an extra bonus to your score!


Coder / Designer - @shinpksk

Artist / Musician - @noverantale


Thank you for playing!
